txt.en: 'Did you - oh, you found it! Thank you, thank you, thank you! I need to get this back to its safe box right away. Oh, thank you!'

'Excuse me, I couldn't help but hear that you're going to Hashadir. Oh, pardon me, where are my manners. I'm Nellagwen, but you can call me Nella, and I really need your help. The thing is, I went wandering down to Hashadir a few days ago without knowing it'd been infested with rats. I was horribly surprised when a group of them swarmed me, a terrifying wave of fur and fleas, and I lost my footing. In doing so, I also seem to have dropped the way-stone that I was using to navigate my way around.

'That way-stone belonged to my great, great, great... well, a very long ago ancestor, and it's been passed down in my family for generations. I came here to ask for help getting it back, but as soon as the word \qrats\q was mentioned, everyone turned their backs on me.

'Please, I beg you - if you're going to Hashadir, can you look for my way-stone? I need to return it to its safe box before mother finds out that it's missing....'
